revised_title: Fossil Bones Discovered in Caverns in the Limestone Quarries of Oreston
tldr: This article describes the discovery of fossil bones in limestone quarries at Oreston. The bones belong to various animals, including deer, bovines, hyenas, horses, wolves, and foxes. The authors discuss the condition of the bones and the presence of disease in some of them. The findings suggest that the animals represented in the fossils are different from those previously found in the area.
